name: Advanced - Join/Leave messages off, another user adds you to a channel

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Advanced - Join/Leave messages off, another user adds you to a channel
————————————————————————————
1. Go to Settings -> Advanced -> Enable Join/Leave Messages -> Edit
2. Set to "Off"
3. Have another user add you to a channel
inline.expectedResult: Even though set to off, you should see mention badge plus system message "you were added to the channel by userwhoaddedyou"
